tool.name: SAGA.sim_rivflow.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayINPUT2 False isArrayINPUT3 False output_data_OUTPUT2 $output_data_OUTPUT2 output_data_OUTPUT3 $output_data_OUTPUT3 output_data_OUTPUT4 $output_data_OUTPUT4 output_data_OUTPUT5 $output_data_OUTPUT5 output_data_OUTPUT6 $output_data_OUTPUT6 output_data_OUTPUT7 $output_data_OUTPUT7 output_data_OUTPUT8 $output_data_OUTPUT8 output_data_OUTPUT9 $output_data_OUTPUT9 name SAGA.sim_rivflow.0 INPUT $INPUT INPUT2 $INPUT2 INPUT3 $INPUT3 WCons $WCons WCons2 $WCons2 pCr $pCr nCr $nCr EnfVmax $EnfVmax VTresh $VTresh prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT2 $OutputSection_OUTPUT2.outputType_OUTPUT2 transmissionMode_OUTPUT2 $OutputSection_OUTPUT2.transmissionMode_OUTPUT2 outputType_OUTPUT3 $OutputSection_OUTPUT3.outputType_OUTPUT3 transmissionMode_OUTPUT3 $OutputSection_OUTPUT3.transmissionMode_OUTPUT3 outputType_OUTPUT4 $OutputSection_OUTPUT4.outputType_OUTPUT4 transmissionMode_OUTPUT4 $OutputSection_OUTPUT4.transmissionMode_OUTPUT4 outputType_OUTPUT5 $OutputSection_OUTPUT5.outputType_OUTPUT5 transmissionMode_OUTPUT5 $OutputSection_OUTPUT5.transmissionMode_OUTPUT5 outputType_OUTPUT6 $OutputSection_OUTPUT6.outputType_OUTPUT6 transmissionMode_OUTPUT6 $OutputSection_OUTPUT6.transmissionMode_OUTPUT6 outputType_OUTPUT7 $OutputSection_OUTPUT7.outputType_OUTPUT7 transmissionMode_OUTPUT7 $OutputSection_OUTPUT7.transmissionMode_OUTPUT7 outputType_OUTPUT8 $OutputSection_OUTPUT8.outputType_OUTPUT8 transmissionMode_OUTPUT8 $OutputSection_OUTPUT8.transmissionMode_OUTPUT8 outputType_OUTPUT9 $OutputSection_OUTPUT9.outputType_OUTPUT9 transmissionMode_OUTPUT9 $OutputSection_OUTPUT9.transmissionMode_OUTPUT9

param.name: INPUT
param.label: DTM
param.help: Digitales Gelaendemodell des Flusseinzugsgebietes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: INPUT2
param.label: HGGrid
param.help: Eingaberaster der Hauptgerinnerasterzellen des Flussnetzwerkes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: INPUT3
param.label: statisches Entnahmeraster
param.help: Eingaberaster mit Angaben zur statischen Flaechenwasserentnahme. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: WCons
param.label: Anteilige Flaechenwasserentnahme
param.help: Wenn gesetzt, werden die Werte des statischen Entahmerasters anteilig entnommen und als Raster statWUse ausgegeben

param.name: WCons2
param.label: Dynamische Flaechenwassernutzung...
param.help: Auswahl der Art der anteiligen Flaechenwasserwasserentnahme.

param.name: pCr
param.label: Hauptgerinne-Parameter pHG
param.help: Parameter pHG zur Berechnung der Lagtime kHG des Hauptgerinneabflusses

param.name: nCr
param.label: Hauptgerinne-Speicherkaskade nHG
param.help: Festlegen, wieviele Speicher die ChannelFlow River-Speicherkaskade enthaelt

param.name: EnfVmax
param.label: Maximal Geschwindigkeit des Hauptgerinnes beruecksichtigen
param.help: Angegebene Maximalgeschwindigkeit im Hauptgerinne bei der Berechnung der durchschnittlichen Flieszgeschwindigkeit des Hauptgerinnes beruecksichtigen.

param.name: VTresh
param.label: Maximalgeschwindigkeit im Hauptgerinne in km/h
param.help: Festlegung der maximalen Wasserflussgeschwindigkeit im Hauptgerinne in km/h (oberer Grenzwert)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT2
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT3
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT3
param.label: Direc
param.help: Ausgabe der Abflussrichtung fuer jede Rasterzelle

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT4
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT5
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT6
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT6
param.label: Coordinates
param.help: Ausgabe der Koordinatenwerte der Rasterzellen im Format xxxx.yyyy

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT7
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT8
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT8
param.label: statWUse
param.help: Ausagbe der anteiligen Flaechenwasserentnahme je Rasterzelle

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT9
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT9
param.label: NumInFlowCells
param.help: Ausgaberaster mit Angabe ueber die Anzahl der Rasterzellen, die in eine spezifische Rasterzelle (x,y) abflieszen
